result.eng: I payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.
result.ga: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seo
result.orig: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seo
result.html: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seoI payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.
result.ponchtml: Ḋíol mé leaṫṁíle euro as an roṫar seoI payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.

result.html: Tháinig mé ar an rotharI came on the bicycle.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig mé ar an roṫarI came on the bicycle.

result.html: Tá rothar nua aigeHe has a new bicycle.
result.ponchtml: Tá roṫar nua aigeHe has a new bicycle.

result.eng: I go to work on my bike.
result.ga: Téim go dtí an obair ar mo rothar
result.orig: Téim go dtí an obair ar mo rothar
result.html: Téim go dtí an obair ar mo rotharI go to work on my bike.
result.ponchtml: Téim go dtí an obair ar mo roṫarI go to work on my bike.
